      • getOWLModel

        public static org.apache.jena.ontology.OntModel getOWLModel()

      • getLabel

        public static String getLabel(org.apache.jena.rdf.model.Resource resource)
        Deprecated. use LabelUtils.getLabel(Resource) instead
        Returns a human-readable label for the specified resource. The value returned will be the first of the following that is present: getLabel() [usually the value of the rdfs:label property] getLocalName() [usually the last path element of the URI] a human-readable description of an anonymous restriction toString()
        Parameters:
        resource -
        Returns:
        a human-readable label for the specified resource

      • getLabels

        public static String getLabels(Iterator<? extends org.apache.jena.rdf.model.Resource> resources)
        Deprecated. use LabelUtils.getLabel(Resource) and a mapping function
        Returns the concatentation of the human-readable labels for the specified resources. The component labels will be those returned by OwlUtils.getLabel(com.hp.hpl.jena.rdf.model.Resource).
        Parameters:
        resources -
        Returns:
        the concatentation of the human-readable labels for the specified resources

      • getUsefulRange

        public static org.apache.jena.ontology.OntClass getUsefulRange(org.apache.jena.ontology.OntProperty p)
        Returns the range of the specified property. Jena seems to include all of the ancestor classes of any specified range (all the way back to rdfs:resource) in the iterator it returns, so it's not actually useful for asking if a given resource is in the property's range. This method constructs a tree of the classes in the range returned by Jena and returns an OWL union class of the leaf nodes.
        Parameters:
        p - the property
        Returns:
        the range of the specified property as a single OWL class

      • getDefaultRange

        public static org.apache.jena.ontology.OntClass getDefaultRange(org.apache.jena.ontology.OntProperty p)
        Returns the default range of the specified property as if it had no explicit range.
        Parameters:
        p -
        Returns:
        the default range of the specified property

      • loadOntologyForUri

        public static void loadOntologyForUri(org.apache.jena.ontology.OntModel model,
                                      String uri)
                               throws SADIException
        Resolve the specified URI and load the resulting statements into the specified OntModel. Resolve imports and relevant isDefinedBy URIs as well. TODO we should probably make the import/isDefinedBy behaviour configurable, including an option to load only the relevant parts of each ontology (using ResourceUtils.reachableClosure)
        Parameters:
        model - the OntModel
        uri - the URI
        Throws:
        SADIException

      • listRestrictedProperties

        public static Set<org.apache.jena.ontology.OntProperty> listRestrictedProperties(String classUri)
                                                                          throws SADIException
        Return the set of properties the OWL class identified by a URI has restrictions on. The ontology containing the OWL class (and any referenced imports) will be fetched and processed.
        Parameters:
        classUri - the URI of the OWL class
        Returns:
        the set of properties the OWL class has restrictions on
        Throws:
        SADIException

      • listRestrictions

        public static Set<org.apache.jena.ontology.Restriction> listRestrictions(org.apache.jena.ontology.OntClass clazz)
        Return the set of property restrictions an OWL class decomposes into.
        Parameters:
        clazz - the OWL class
        Returns:
        the set of property restrictions the OWL class decomposes into

      • listRestrictions

        public static Set<org.apache.jena.ontology.Restriction> listRestrictions(org.apache.jena.ontology.OntClass clazz,
                                                                         org.apache.jena.ontology.OntClass relativeTo)
        Return the set of property restrictions an OWL class adds relative to another OWL class. Usually the second class will be a superclass of the first.
        Parameters:
        clazz - the OWL class to decompose
        relativeTo - the OWL class to decompose relative to
        Returns:
        the set of property restrictions the OWL class adds

      • listTypes

      • createDummyInstance

        public static org.apache.jena.rdf.model.Resource createDummyInstance(org.apache.jena.ontology.OntClass clazz)
        Returns an individual that conforms to the restrictions of the specified class. This instance will be created in a new memory model. NB: this is dangerous; it's quite easy to create an infinitely-looping construct.
        Parameters:
        clazz - the OntClass
        Returns:
        an individual that conforms to the restrictions of the specified class

      • createDummyInstance

        public static org.apache.jena.rdf.model.Resource createDummyInstance(org.apache.jena.rdf.model.Model model,
                                                                     org.apache.jena.ontology.OntClass clazz)
        Returns an individual in the specified model that conforms to the restrictions of the specified class. NB: this is dangerous; it's quite easy to create an infinitely-looping construct.
        Parameters:
        model - the model in which to create the new individual
        clazz - the OntClass
        Returns:
        an individual that conforms to the restrictions of the specified class

      • getMinimalModel

        public static org.apache.jena.rdf.model.Model getMinimalModel(org.apache.jena.rdf.model.Resource individual,
                                                              org.apache.jena.ontology.OntClass asClass)
        Return the minimal RDF required for the specified individual to satisfy the specified class description. Note that the RDF will not be complete if the individual is not in the same OntModel as the OntClass or does not satisfy the class requirements.
        Parameters:
        individual - the individual
        asClass - the class
        Returns:
        a new in-memory model containing the minimal RDF
